about.title: The Story of Being Women
about.subtitle: Celebrating the rich heritage of Indian fashion while embracing modern elegance

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Being Women, we are dedicated to bringing you authentic, stylish, and high-quality Indian ethnic wear. Our mission is to preserve and celebrate the rich traditions of Indian fashion while making it accessible to the modern woman.

items.title: Authenticity
items.description: Every piece in our collection reflects the true essence of Indian craftsmanship and cultural heritage.

items.title: Quality
items.description: We source the finest fabrics and work with skilled artisans to create garments that last.

items.title: Tradition Meets Modern
items.description: Our designs honor traditional techniques while embracing contemporary styles for today's woman.

founder.title: A Message from Our Founder
founder.message: Indian ethnic wear is more than just clothing â€“ it's a celebration of our rich cultural heritage, a symbol of timeless elegance, and a way to connect with our traditions. At Being Women, we're dedicated to bringing you authentic designs that make you feel confident and beautiful, especially during festive celebrations like Navratri.
founder.name: Priya Sharma

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: Being Women is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

features.title: Accessibility Features
list: Semantic HTML for better screen reader compatibility

Resizable text without loss of functionality

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more

questions.a: For domestic orders within India, standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping is available for 2-3 business days. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

questions.q: How do I find my perfect size?
questions.a: Use our detailed size guide with measurements for all garments. For lehengas, measure your bust, waist, and hip. For kurtis, take shoulder, bust, and length measurements. When in doubt, size up.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

hero.title: Wedding Tailoring Services
hero.subtitle: Experience the artistry of traditional Gujarati craftsmanship with our bespoke bridal wear tailoring services

bridal.title: Bridal Lehenga Stitching
bridal.description: Experience the artistry of our master tailors with custom bridal lehengas featuring traditional Gujarati mirror work, intricate embroidery, and premium fabrics like silk and velvet. Each piece is meticulously crafted to create your perfect bridal ensemble, combining timeless traditions with contemporary elegance.

blouse.title: Designer Blouse Customization
blouse.description: Transform your bridal look with our expertly crafted designer blouses. From deep neck designs to sleeveless styles, each blouse is tailored to perfection with detailed embroidery work. Our skilled artisans ensure the perfect fit while incorporating traditional elements that complement your bridal saree or lehenga.

dupatta.title: Dupatta Styling & Fall Finishing
dupatta.description: Elevate your bridal ensemble with our custom dupatta styling services. We specialize in creating stunning dupattas with intricate lace work, elegant tassels, and beautiful border embellishments. Our expert craftswomen ensure each piece enhances your bridal elegance while maintaining traditional aesthetics.

gharChola.title: Bridal Ghar Chola Outfits
gharChola.description: Embrace tradition with our custom-crafted Ghar Chola outfits. Each piece features exquisite zari work and gota-patti finishes, creating the perfect traditional wedding attire. Our tailors pay special attention to incorporating authentic Gujarati elements while ensuring modern comfort and style.

family.title: Mother & Sister of Bride Looks
family.description: Complete your family's wedding ensemble with our coordinated outfits for the mother and sisters of the bride. Our designers create harmonious looks that complement the bridal attire while maintaining individual elegance. Each piece is tailored to perfection, ensuring everyone shines on the special day.

cta.title: Create Your Dream Wedding Outfit
cta.subtitle: Let our expert tailors bring your vision to life. Book a consultation today and experience the excellence of traditional Gujarati craftsmanship.

hero.title: Navratri Tailoring Services
hero.subtitle: Celebrate the divine nine nights with perfectly tailored traditional Gujarati attire

chaniyaCholi.title: Chaniya Choli Custom Fit
chaniyaCholi.description: Experience the perfect fit with our custom-tailored chaniya cholis, designed specifically for Garba and Dandiya. Each piece features traditional mirror work and embroidery while ensuring comfortable movement for dancing. Our expert tailors create flares that complement your style and dancing grace.

garbaWear.title: Garba Crop Tops & Blouses
garbaWear.description: Dance the night away in our specially designed Garba tops and blouses. Each piece is crafted with breathable fabrics and secure stitching, allowing free movement while maintaining style. We incorporate traditional elements with modern comfort for the perfect festive wear.

alterations.title: Ghagra Alterations
alterations.description: Transform your ready-made ghagras with our expert alteration services. We specialize in waistline customization, flair adjustments, and length modifications to ensure your outfit fits perfectly. Our skilled tailors maintain the original design while enhancing comfort and fit.

fusion.title: Kediyu & Dhoti Style Fusion
fusion.description: Embrace modern festive fashion with our fusion Kediyu and Dhoti styles. We combine traditional Gujarati elements with contemporary designs, creating unique outfits perfect for special Garba nights. Each piece is tailored to provide both style and comfort.

accessories.title: Accessories Stitching
accessories.description: Complete your Navratri look with our custom-stitched accessories. From elaborately designed dupattas to matching potli bags and decorative latkans, we create coordinated pieces that perfectly complement your festive attire.

cta.title: Get Ready for Navratri
cta.subtitle: Let our expert tailors create your perfect festive attire. Book a consultation today and experience the joy of custom-fitted traditional wear.

hero.title: Casual Wear Tailoring
hero.subtitle: Experience the comfort of perfectly fitted everyday wear with our expert tailoring services

kurtis.title: Kurtis & Tunics Tailoring
kurtis.description: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style with our custom-tailored kurtis and tunics. We specialize in creating unique pieces using traditional Gujarati fabrics like bandhej, ajrakh, and ikkat. Each garment is crafted to ensure both comfort and elegance for your everyday wear.

salwar.title: Salwar Kameez Sets
salwar.description: Discover comfort and elegance with our custom-tailored salwar kameez sets. Our skilled artisans create perfectly fitted outfits with trendy necklines and various sleeve options. Each piece is designed to provide both style and comfort for your daily wear.

blouses.title: Workwear Saree Blouses
blouses.description: Look professional and feel confident with our custom-tailored workwear saree blouses. We create elegant, breathable designs perfect for office wear and semi-formal occasions. Each blouse is crafted to ensure comfort during long working hours while maintaining a sharp, professional appearance.

lehengas.title: Simple Lehengas for Daywear
lehengas.description: Add grace to your daily ethnic wear with our lightweight lehenga designs. Perfect for special day events, each piece is crafted to provide comfort while maintaining elegance. We create versatile pieces that can be mixed and matched for various occasions.

alterations.title: Alteration Services
alterations.description: Give your existing outfits a fresh look with our professional alteration services. Whether you need to resize, refit, or redesign your garments, our experienced tailors ensure each piece is modified to perfection while maintaining its original charm.

cta.title: Elevate Your Daily Style
cta.subtitle: Let our expert tailors create your perfect everyday wear. Book a consultation today and experience the comfort of custom-fitted fashion.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to experience the perfect fit? Book a consultation with our expert tailors today.

notes.quality: All outfits are tailored in-house with top quality craftsmanship.
